meta.title: Muthukrishnan Bommiah | Executive Director, Principal Architect Cloud Data and AI
meta.description: Portfolio for a seasoned technology leader specializing in designing and delivering cutting-edge cloud, data, and AI solutions that propel organizations forward.

personal.name: Muthukrishnan Bommiah
personal.title: Executive Director, Principal Architect Cloud Data and AI

about.bio: Empowering businesses to thrive in a rapidly evolving technological landscape, I am a seasoned technology leader with a proven track record of designing and delivering cutting-edge solutions that propel organizations forward. With a unique blend of technical expertise, business acumen, and leadership skills, I excel in driving digital transformation and fostering a culture of innovation. With a passion for collaboration and a talent for communicating complex ideas, I am a trusted advisor to senior leadership and a driving force behind organizational success.
focus: Designing and implementing comprehensive Data and AI architecture frameworks for multi-cloud and hybrid-cloud strategies.
Architecting and deploying end-to-end Generative AI solutions on cloud platforms like GCP to drive business productivity and cost savings.
Leading large-scale modernization initiatives, including migration to Big Query, and developing enterprise data platforms to align with business objectives.

experience.title: Executive Director, Principal Architect Cloud Data and Al
experience.description: A transformational leader designing and implementing comprehensive data architecture frameworks to drive business growth through technology innovation. Serving as a strategic advisor to senior leadership on enterprise architecture, Data and AI strategy, and engineering leadership, with a proven track record of leading large-scale modernization initiatives and transforming customer experience through advanced analytics and artificial intelligence.
achievements: Architected and launched the first business use case for Generative AI, improving employee productivity by 30-40% and paving the way for 12 additional use cases with an estimated $65 million in cost savings.
Led the development of a Customer Analytics platform, deploying the first application with confidential data in Google Big Query to empower advanced analytics and ML models.
Drove the realization of significant business solutions, including Flex Loans (53MM unique offers in the first month) and a Debt to Income application (2MM API calls per day)

experience.title: Staff Engineer, Data and Analytics Platform
experience.description: Spearheaded the design and maintenance of large-scale cloud-native data and analytics platforms, driving transformative modernization, performance enhancements, and cost reductions. Led modernization efforts, developed cutting-edge machine learning platforms, and implemented robust continuous delivery pipelines, resulting in a 45% reduction in data processing time and a 25% increase in system uptime.
achievements: Implemented continuous delivery principles, reducing machine learning deployment time from 8 weeks to under 1 week.
Engineered data movement pipelines processing over 25 billion records per day and moving over 500 TB of data to AWS S3 with an automated governance framework.
Modernized data platforms to achieve 20X improved scalability and a 10X reduction in latency.

experience.title: Lead Software Engineer, Data and Analytics Platform
experience.description: Designed and implemented a unified ML platform using Domino Data Science Platform, accelerating research and improving the model lifecycle. Architected cloud-native ML systems with microservices, developed a single-click model deployment console, and commoditized AWS compute deployments for data scientists across the enterprise.
achievements: Designed and implemented the Model Deploy Console, providing single-click model deployment from Domino to OpenShift Container Platform and Airflow.
Influenced enterprise-wide decisions for the analytics community by helping develop new standards and setting the strategic direction for data science IT platforms.
Served as the Technical SME and application owner for numerous tools, including Domino, SAS, Spark, Airflow, and various development paradigms.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication
